name: Ludo Clash: Play Ludo Online
description:
Play Ludo with your friends, family or other players in the world.

Features:

- Play online with other players
- Add friends and team up with them.
- Chat with other players in the game
- Send emojis
- Play local or with bots.
- Play classic or quick mode.

Send your feedbacks here:
https://ludoclash.vivinte.com/support
